java.io.Serializable
public class ChartObjectEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

Event used to pass parameters of chart object change

Method Detail

isCanceled

public boolean isCanceled()
Returns true if event was canceled. New events always arrive with this parameter set to false

Returns:
true if event was canceled

cancel

public void cancel()
Allows to cancel changes made by this event. Not all events can be canceled

getType

public ChartObjectEvent.AttrType getType()
Returns type of the attribute changed event

Returns:
type

isAdjusting

public boolean isAdjusting()
Returns true if current event is for ajusting action. For example there will be many events with this attribute set to true while user moves the drawing and only one final event with isAdjusting == false when user releases drawing at the end. Changes in attribute or cancel methods are ignored when isAdjusting is true

Returns:
true if event is not about final position
